text: in kathaon mein, budhdimaanon ke lie badee shiksha hai, ye (quraan) aisee baaton ka sangrah nahin hai, jise svayan bana liya jaata ho, parantu isase pahale kee pustakon kee sidhdi aur pratyek vastu ka vivaran (byora) hai tatha maargadarshan aur daya hai, un logon ke lie jo eemaan (vishvaas) rakhate hon
